name: Disable The Keystone
description:
[b]ID: 2176002773[/b] | Just disables The Keystone
[b]Version : 1.0.1[/b]

Disable The Keystone is a mod for Conan Exiles that does just that, disabling The Keystone. You've done all this for nothing, now go back to work slave, this is your true home... [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2175333316]There is only one way out...[/url]

Works in singleplayer/co-op and dedicated servers.

[url=https://github.com/srcanseco/DisableTheKeystone/releases]Download older versions[/url]

[h1]About Disable The Keystone[/h1]
I wanted to disable the keystone so I just made a mod for it, there in not much to say

[h1]Compatibility[/h1]
This should be compatible with everything that doesn't touch The Keystone ItemTable entry (15517)

[h1]Features[/h1]
[b][✅][/b] Disables The Keystone forever
[b][✅][/b] Adds a The Keystone item that works (admin only)

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2176002773]Changelog[/url]

[h1]Known bugs[/h1]
- None so far.
changeNote:
v1.0.1
- Added a non craftable The Keystone item for admins
author: C4N
